game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact hidden in the ruins.
game.description: 传闻在遥远的遗迹中埋藏着一件古代神器，你的任务是找到它并带回。
game.reward: 1000 gold coins and a legendary sword

task.description: Talk to the village elder for information about the ruins' location.
Bypass the traps and guards to enter the heart of the ruins.
Search the inner sanctum for the ancient artifact.
